entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Nain
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 in the Natuashish area.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7 except low minus 11 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
